DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH : INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
DOC.TEXT: EC to Investigate Air France Restructuring Plan : The European Commission said it will investigate the_French government ' s plans to inject $ 3.56 billion into Air France to determine if the aid would violate European Union rules.The investigation would focus in part on whether the aid would harm competition . Under the restructuring plan announced in March to make Air France profitable , the state-owned carrier has agreed to slash 12 % of its work_force and freeze wages until 1996 . Meanwhile , the_French government said it will change Air France ' s corporate structure in_order to distribute shares to employees as dividends and to compensate for pay_cuts and other concessions .
